NewsArticle.Title: Nexon fixed Ascension Desecration
NewsArticle.Content: When a powerful Aisling begins his quest of ascension at the Mileth Altar, he becomes corrupted by dark powers and may be slain. In this manner he journeys into the underworld to complete his quest and meet the god Deoch or Gramail. However, the duration had been too short. It is corrected to a very long duration of vulnerability. Beware. Learn more about Ascension.
